column1: Little Goat Diner////I've been going to Little Goat Bread a lot recently too
column2: because their Little Goat Latte is seriously delicious. I can't eat most of the baked goods
column3: but they do have a gluten-free pineapple crunch muffin
column5: and a parmesan roll I haven't had yet. Everyone's pretty friendly over on that side
